Comment and analysis on the big stories of the day in Ireland and abroad with a panel of guests covering the key issues.
Goodwin puts his career on the line to fight for justice when a young boy is injured in a factory accident.
A rotating panel of four female figures from the worlds of journalism and entertainment talk about various issues of importance though a woman's perspective.
Brian Dowling and his design team are on a mission to prove that you can achieve the home renovation of your dreams without it literally costing the earth.
The busy Christmas airport is thrown into jeopardy with the discovery of an unidentified white powder on board an incoming flight.
Nostalgic medical drama. A face from the past spells trouble for Klein; Brigid makes a decision about her future; and Ormerod and Weatherill decide to break up.
Medical drama series. A farming accident turns out to be something more serious, and Dr Ormerod is called to a party of fossil hunters trapped on the cliffs.
Some of the top celebrities across Ireland are interviewed while the hosts feature knowledgeable advice on topics that cover multiple topics and industries.
The unfiltered realities Irish people face in the search for a home, taking a look at the emotional rollercoaster, challenges and hard-won joys of buying a property.
Roy Keane and Mick McCarthy have their famous disagreement; Bertie Ahern leads Fianna Fail to victory in the general election.
A series which chronicles the news and events of the past 20 years, all set to music. This episode looks back at the year 2003.
Paul McGrath played at three major tournaments throughout Irelands golden era. He relives a club and international career and his battles on and off the field.
Michael Carruth talks about his life inside and outside of the boxing ring and that faithful night in 1992 when he became the first Irishman to win an Olympic Gold medal in boxing.

Dating series. In Cardiff, three singletons go up against each other in a series of shopping challenges to win the affections of Mr Gay Wales 2017, Ben Brown.
Roman Kemp hosts this quiz show with sidekick Sarah Greene. The contestants race on moving podiums across the studio floor to try to win Â£5,000.
With Mark, Heather and Jacqui.
Judge Judy presides over her courtroom with wit and wisdom.

A mix of celebrity interviews, entertainment news, current affairs discussions, a look at sports competitions, health columns, cooking tips and tricks, and more.

John Torode and Lisa Faulkner are back. On the Greek-inspired menu are a rack of lamb, prawn saganaki pies, moussaka and a deceptively easy baklava.
Cooking competition hosted by Sheree Murphy which sees professional chefs select an amateur partner to work with in the final. Paul Ainsworth selects his cook.
Bill Turnbull hosts a quiz show featuring a regular cast of contributors known as the Think Tank who answer hundreds of questions before the show.
Ainsley makes fried mackerel, tomato and pomegranate salad; Ben Ebbrell makes summer courgette chilaquiles; Cyrus Todiwala makes spicy chicken thighs and vegetables.
Ainsley is joined by chefs Serena Appleby and Judy Joo at Tyntesfield, Somerset for a light-hearted cooking contest in the National Trust estates, stunning kitchen garden.
Eamonn Holmes and Ruth Langsford host the fun daily quiz. Three engaged couples have the chance to win their wedding gift list - and a dream holiday.
Cooking competition hosted by Sheree Murphy which sees professional chefs select an amateur partner to work with in the final. Jun Tanaka makes his decision.
A secret from Jean's past comes back to haunt her. Dr Weatherill has to break some shocking news to a young couple. Has Alun found true love at long last?
A family day at the park ends in disaster for the Ormerods, Dr Ellis risks getting too involved with a patient in trouble and Lizzie attempts to improve her word power.
Torrential rain closes two runways as an incoming flight deals with a life or death situation. A fire training exercise turns into the real thing.

Extreme angler Jeremy Wade visits Papua New Guinea, an island renowned for cannibalism, macabre rituals, headhunters and bitter tribal conflict.
Steve learns that Ryan might have a potential client; a virtual buyer tries Ryan's patience due to a long list of needs and limited knowledge of the city.

programmes.show_name: The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills
programmes.show_description: Follow the lavish lives of six savvy champagne-swilling Beverly Hills women who were born for shopping and partying! Sutton takes the ladies on a fabulous getaway to Barcelona.
When the crew of Lady Michelle grapples with the fallout of Lexi and Chef Mathew's fight, Captain Sandy steps in to figure out who stays and who goes.
Schwartz and Sandoval use their "friendship break" as an excuse to see other people, but when construction delays the opening date of their new bar, the two throw a party to show off the space
